#Text=Buddhist UNESCO World Heritage site in India suffers terrorist attack
#Text=Monday , July 8 , 2013
#Text=Mahabodhi Temple in December , 2006 .
#Text=Image : Cacahuate .
#Text=A ' terrorist attack ' took place yesterday in the form of reportedly at least four explosions at the Mahabodhi Temple in Bodh Gaya , India .
#Text=Four other explosions took place in the vicinity , including one near an eighty-foot tall statue of Buddha and three at Tergar Monastery .
#Text=Three other bombs were discovered and all were diffused .
#Text=Early reports claim little damage was done to the temple .
#Text=Two Buddhist monks were injured .
#Text=Police commented that Sundays are quiet days at the temple , or more could have been injured .
#Text=One suspect has been arrested based on closed circuit television that recorded two men placing bombs at the temple .
#Text=Mahabodhi Temple is considered one of the holiest sites in Buddhism and in India .
#Text=Totaling twelve acres , it is a designated UNESCO World Heritage Site .
#Text=The temple is located next to the Bodhi tree , where Buddhists believe that Buddha achieved enlightenment .
#Text=The bombs were described as " low-intensity but not crude , " according to police .
#Text=The bombs used comprised of a small container with gas , a detonator , and an analog clock .
#Text=The bombs were timed to explode at 5:45 AM local time , when Buddhists start praying in the morning .
#Text=The bombs actually went off starting at 5:25 AM and ending at 5:58 AM local time .
#Text=Early reports state that while the temple suffered little damage , the staircase near the Bodhi tree suffered damage and windows were broken .
#Text=The Bodhi tree suffered no damage .
#Text=200 monks live at the monastery , where daily classes take place during the times when the explosions happened .
#Text=However , no classes were being held the morning of the attack .
#Text=The Ministry of Home Affairs has declared the explosions an act of terrorism .
#Text=In October members of the Indian Mujahideen claimed to have visited Mahabodhi Temple to plan a terrorist attack .
#Text=That led to the arrests of four suspects involved in the Indian Mujahideen , who were believed to have been involved in the 2012 Pune bombings .
#Text=The four suspects named other members of the terrorist group and claimed that they planned to attack Mahabodhi Temple .
#Text=The police in Delhi claim to have told the police in Bihar about the potential of a terrorist attack .
#Text=Political conflict has risen in the wake of the attacks between the Bharatiya Janata Party ( BJP ) and Indian National Congress .
#Text=BJP is accusing the United Progressive Alliance , which is under the umbrella of the Indian National Congress , of ignoring the Indian Mujahideen 's threats about attacking the temple .
#Text=The Ministry also believes that it could be tied to conflicts in Myanmar between Buddhists and Muslims , despite the rarity of violence against Buddhists in India .
#Text=Additional security has been placed at Buddhist temples and Tibetan communities in India after the explosions .
#Text=One suspect , Vinod Mistri , was arrested on Monday morning in Patna .
